mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.report_name AS "reportName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.organ_id AS "organId", a.row_one AS "rowOne", a.row_two AS "rowTwo", a.row1_one AS "row1One", a.row1_two AS "row1Two", a.row2_one AS "row2One", a.row2_two AS "row2Two", a.row3_one AS "row3One", a.row3_two AS "row3Two", a.row4_one AS "row4One", a.row4_two AS "row4Two", a.row5_one AS "row5One", a.row5_two AS "row5Two", a.row6_one AS "row6One", a.row6_two AS "row6Two", a.row7_one AS "row7One", a.row7_two AS "row7Two", a.row8_one AS "row8One", a.row8_two AS "row8Two", a.row9_one AS "row9One", a.row9_two AS "row9Two", a.row10_two AS "row10Two", a.row11_one AS "row11One", a.row11_two AS "row11Two", a.row12_one AS "row12One", a.row12_two AS "row12Two", a.row13_one AS "row13One", a.row13_two AS "row13Two", a.row14_one AS "row14One", a.row14_two AS "row14Two", a.row15_one AS "row15One", a.row15_two AS "row15Two", a.row16_one AS "row16One", a.row16_two AS "row16Two", a.row17_one AS "row17One", a.row18_one AS "row18One", a.row19_one AS "row19One", a.row20_one AS "row20One", a.row21_two AS "row21Two", a.row22_one AS "row22One", a.row22_two AS "row22Two", a.row23_one AS "row23One", a.row23_two AS "row23Two", a.row24_one AS "row24One", a.row25_one AS "row25One", a.row26_one AS "row26One", a.row27_one AS "row27One", a.row28_one AS "row28One", a.row28_two AS "row28Two", a.row29_one AS "row29One", a.row29_two AS "row29Two", a.row30_one AS "row30One", a.row30_two AS "row30Two", a.row31_one AS "row31One", a.row31_two AS "row31Two", a.row32_one AS "row32One", a.row32_two AS "row32Two"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_cash_flux( id, report_name, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, organ_id, row_one, row_two, row1_one, row1_two, row2_one, row2_two, row3_one, row3_two, row4_one, row4_two, row5_one, row5_two, row6_one, row6_two, row7_one, row7_two, row8_one, row8_two, row9_one, row9_two, row10_two, row11_one, row11_two, row12_one, row12_two, row13_one, row13_two, row14_one, row14_two, row15_one, row15_two, row16_one, row16_two, row17_one, row18_one, row19_one, row20_one, row21_two, row22_one, row22_two, row23_one, row23_two, row24_one, row25_one, row26_one, row27_one, row28_one, row28_two, row29_one, row29_two, row30_one, row30_two, row31_one, row31_two, row32_one, row32_two ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{reportName}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{organId}, #{rowOne}, #{rowTwo}, #{row1One}, #{row1Two}, #{row2One}, #{row2Two}, #{row3One}, #{row3Two}, #{row4One}, #{row4Two}, #{row5One}, #{row5Two}, #{row6One}, #{row6Two}, #{row7One}, #{row7Two}, #{row8One}, #{row8Two}, #{row9One}, #{row9Two}, #{row10Two}, #{row11One}, #{row11Two}, #{row12One}, #{row12Two}, #{row13One}, #{row13Two}, #{row14One}, #{row14Two}, #{row15One}, #{row15Two}, #{row16One}, #{row16Two}, #{row17One}, #{row18One}, #{row19One}, #{row20One}, #{row21Two}, #{row22One}, #{row22Two}, #{row23One}, #{row23Two}, #{row24One}, #{row25One}, #{row26One}, #{row27One}, #{row28One}, #{row28Two}, #{row29One}, #{row29Two}, #{row30One}, #{row30Two}, #{row31One}, #{row31Two}, #{row32One}, #{row32Two} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_cash_flux SET report_name = #{reportName}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, row_one = #{rowOne}, row_two = #{rowTwo}, row1_one = #{row1One}, row1_two = #{row1Two}, row2_one = #{row2One}, row2_two = #{row2Two}, row3_one = #{row3One}, row3_two = #{row3Two}, row4_one = #{row4One}, row4_two = #{row4Two}, row5_one = #{row5One}, row5_two = #{row5Two}, row6_one = #{row6One}, row6_two = #{row6Two}, row7_one = #{row7One}, row7_two = #{row7Two}, row8_one = #{row8One}, row8_two = #{row8Two}, row9_one = #{row9One}, row9_two = #{row9Two}, row10_two = #{row10Two}, row11_one = #{row11One}, row11_two = #{row11Two}, row12_one = #{row12One}, row12_two = #{row12Two}, row13_one = #{row13One}, row13_two = #{row13Two}, row14_one = #{row14One}, row14_two = #{row14Two}, row15_one = #{row15One}, row15_two = #{row15Two}, row16_one = #{row16One}, row16_two = #{row16Two}, row17_one = #{row17One}, row18_one = #{row18One}, row19_one = #{row19One}, row20_one = #{row20One}, row21_two = #{row21Two}, row22_one = #{row22One}, row22_two = #{row22Two}, row23_one = #{row23One}, row23_two = #{row23Two}, row24_one = #{row24One}, row25_one = #{row25One}, row26_one = #{row26One}, row27_one = #{row27One}, row28_one = #{row28One}, row28_two = #{row28Two}, row29_one = #{row29One}, row29_two = #{row29Two}, row30_one = #{row30One}, row30_two = #{row30Two}, row31_one = #{row31One}, row31_two = #{row31Two}, row32_one = #{row32One}, row32_two = #{row32Two} WHERE id = #{id}
